title: Agnes Sorel: The Breast And Crotch That Changed History
description: Agnes Sorel was the most beautiful woman in the world. Armed with breasts of unrivaled magnificence she used her cunning crotch to influence history forever. When she was eighteen, she knew that she was destined to rule a great nation. To do so, she had to learn to seduce men and yet remain a virgin. She had to employ bosom, groin and brains to seduce King Charles VII of France, who, in turn allowed her to rule France and lead Europe out of the Middle Ages and into Modern Times. Never before or since in history did the judicious use of sexual savoir-faire play so heavy a role in human affairs. Agnes shares her sexual secrets within the pages of this book. Check it out. You will love her dazzling breasts and clever crotch.
author: Tim Desmondes
